Plot: Simon has an encounter with Downworlders and is reprimanded for not following the rules for Academy students interacting with Downworlders. A story within a story: Andrew Blackthorn, while a student at the Academy, becomes enthralled by a faerie and has two children with her: Mark and Helen.
Characters: Helen Blackthorn, Isabelle "Izzy" Sophia Lightwood, Catarina Loss, George Lovelace, Julie Beauvale, Beatriz Mendoza, Jon Cartwright, Simon Lewis
